about.historyText: Founded in [year], our company started with a simple idea: [describe the initial idea]. Since then, we have grown to become [describe the current state of the company].
about.missionText: Our mission is to [describe your company's mission]. We strive to [mention main objectives].
about.teamworkDesc: We believe in the power of collaboration and mutual support.
about.innovationDesc: We constantly seek new ways to improve and push boundaries.
about.integrityDesc: We uphold the highest standards of honesty and ethical behavior.
about.sustainabilityDesc: We are committed to environmentally responsible practices.
about.joinTeamText: We're always looking for talented individuals to join our growing team.

terms.termsIntroduction: Welcome to our platform. By accessing and using this service, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use.
terms.useOfServiceDescription: Our service is designed to provide a safe and satisfactory online shopping experience. By using our service, you agree to:
terms.useOfServiceItem1: Provide accurate and complete information when creating an account or making a purchase.
terms.useOfServiceItem2: Use the service in an ethical and legal manner.
terms.useOfServiceItem3: Not interfere with the normal operation of the website or attempt to access restricted areas.
terms.privacyPolicyDescription: Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
terms.intellectualPropertyDescription: All content present on this website, including texts, graphics, logos, images, and software, is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
terms.limitationOfLiabilityDescription: We make every effort to ensure the accuracy and availability of our service, but we cannot guarantee that it will be error-free or uninterrupted. We will not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
terms.governingLawDescription: These terms and conditions will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the country where our company is registered, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
